sub_title: Global IMC Lead at Miro // ex-Nike
summary: Experienced Marketing and Brand Leader with over 10 years of expertise in digital marketing and brand development. Proven track record in driving business performance, maximizing ROI, and delighting users through the design and execution of integrated marketing programs and campaigns. Skilled in leading cross-functional teams, providing thought leadership, and optimizing marketing strategies to achieve goals. Recognized for successful global brand roll-outs, strategic channel management, and delivering outstanding digital support for major events and platforms.

profile_positions.description: Responsible for designing and developing best-in-class integrated marketing programs/campaigns from inception to execution that drives business performance, maximize ROI, delight users, and grow the brand.
profile_positions.title: Global Brand IMC Lead

profile_positions.description:
- Working with team and agencies to ensure delivery of projects to the highest standard and within agreed timelines.
- Implementing and managing complex digital projects personally and through my team and agency partners.
- Implementing new working practices, tools, and processes, which enable the team to operate effectively.
- Working collaboratively with wider company teams and building strategic partnerships. 
- Managing, developing, and building a digital team of designers, developers, project managers, and social delivery experts.
- I oversee workflows and ensure appropriate resources are available to expedite timely execution of digital projects, ensuring efficient use of resources at all times.
profile_positions.title: Global Head of Production

profile_positions.description:
Set strategy for Nike App / KPI's and achieve fiscal goals. YoY 200% growth for two years in a row. 
Lead, drive, and influence acquisition/download plan and its execution.  
Lead discussions on app updates and new functionality/capability requests. 

Achievements: - Successful roll-out of Nike App to additional 13 countries
profile_positions.title: Product Marketing Lead - Nike App

profile_positions.description:
- Leading digital campaign for World Cup in Russia and further implementation for all products (strategy, planning, digital production, content creation, analysis)
- Support of nike.com (content, digital activations, analytics & lead generation)
- Leading Digital team, and establish a vision and tone consistent across all platforms;
- Supporting all brand activations with digital support across all platforms;
- Coordination of creative & media agency

Achievements:
- Won a global Maxim Award in Nike for the best project that year globally. Best employee of the year Nike Global (EMEA JDI, Global JDI Award)
profile_positions.title: Digital Lead - World Cup 18'

profile_positions.description: - Creating, leading and further implementing digital tools, from zero. For all products and platfroms (strategy, planning, digital production, content creation, analysis). - Support of nike.com (content, digital activations, analytics & lead generation) - Leading Digital team, and establish a vision and tone consistent across all platforms; - Supporting all brand activations with digital support across all platforms; - Coordination of creative & media agency
